frontmatter.title: Bokdda
frontmatter.desc: 복지서비스 검색과 신청과정의 단순화를 위해 기획한 서비스입니다. 총 6가지의 기준으로 복지를 분류하였고, 정부서비스와 연동하여 가족관계증명서, 주민등록등본 등 자주 쓰이는 서류를 생체인증 한번으로 제출할 수 있게끔 했습니다.

frontmatter.title: Javara-light
frontmatter.desc: Light and Power solution for Africa. We use solar panel to supply power.

frontmatter.title: Hydrogen Compressor
frontmatter.desc: Hydrogen compressor development project that does not require additional sealing by applying a magnet type rodless cylinder.

frontmatter.title: 군복무 가이드
frontmatter.desc: 예비군인과 현직군인을 위한 금융, 혜택정보 제공 서비스입니다.

frontmatter.title: ALD equipments
frontmatter.desc: In the ALD process, wafer can't move to another space. Because wafers can be polluted by gas or particles. But if wafer can move to another space without pollution, process productivity will increase. So, our team developed this equipment prototype to prove our theory.

frontmatter.title: Fire Alarm
frontmatter.desc: Fire alarm provided with a fire extinguisher. We produced two types, a press process to bend the steel plate and mass production through an injection mold.

frontmatter.title: OLED Equipment
frontmatter.desc: This equipment is used to safely transport OLED materials. We considered compatibility with existing equipment and operator's safety

frontmatter.title: Toothbrush
frontmatter.desc: Toothbrush can be used as a module type. We made it compatible with ready-made toothbrush holders.
